New Records: Mohammad Rizwan became the joint-fastest to 2000 runs in T20Is
Key Match Events: Babar and Rizwan put on 85 runs for the opening wicket
England won the match to take a 1-0 lead in the 7-match series
Rizwan scored 68 runs off 46 balls with six fours and one six
Babar scored 31 runs off 24 balls with three fours
England got past the finishing line with four balls to spare
Post-Match Reflections: The way we played the first powerplay was great. After 10 overs, there was a swing of momentum, which you have to credit England for. We didn't have enough big partnerships. Our batters need to step up
Published By: sabyasachi chowdhury, Published On: Sep 20, 2022
Miscellaneous Highlights: Babar Azam, on Thursday, September 20, clearly said that Pakistan batters need to step up and chip in with consistent performances
Rizwan became the joint-fastest to 2000 runs in T20Is
With three runs to win off the last five balls, Harry Brook hit a four through the cover region to take the Three Lions home
